sect2.title: Installation of Fileutils
sect2.para:
Before we install fileutils statically, if you are using glibc-2.2.3 you need to apply two seds in order to prevent them giving segmentation faults once we enter chroot in Chapter 6. The sed commands for those using glibc-2.2.3 are:
sed 's/\(.*\)\(fopen-safer\.c \)\\/\1\2atexit.c \\/' \ lib/Makefile.in > tmp && sed 's/\(.*\)\(idcache\$U\.\$.*\)\\/\1\2atexit$U.$(OBJEXT) \\/' \ tmp > lib/Makefile.in

Install fileutils by running the following commands: ./configure --disable-nls \ --prefix=$LFS/usr --libexecdir=$LFS/bin --bindir=$LFS/bin && make LDFLAGS=-static && make install && cd $LFS/usr/bin && ln -s ../../bin/install
